title: Looking for ADC main to duo with Gold - Plat
body: Im a support main Please hit me up lmao, Looking for a good adc duo :) Im g4-g3 IGN Is Skyla, hit me up :D

replies.body: Yo. G3 AD main, feel free to hit me up, sent you a request if you're keen.

hey im an adc main who was in gold 4 for awhile but then my friend who was put in gold after placement got me dwon into silver then i got a bunch of crappy teams  and went to bronze but if i get to gold i will tell you {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
